definitions: (of a place) provided with defensive works as protection against attack
shortDefinitions: provided with defensive works as protection against attack

definitions: denoting wine of a type to which spirits have been added so as to produce port, sherry, or a similar drink
shortDefinitions: (of wine) having had spirits added to make port, etc.

definitions: (of food) having had vitamins or other supplements added so as to increase the nutritional value
shortDefinitions: (of food) having had vitamins added to increase its nutritive value
